subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Matt Reynolds, a backup shortstop called up after Ruben Tejada’s injury, and Steven Matz, a possible starter in Game 4, awaited opportunities as the Mets prepared to face the Dodgers.
snippet: Matt Reynolds, a backup shortstop called up after Ruben Tejada’s injury, and Steven Matz, a possible starter in Game 4, awaited opportunities as the Mets prepared to face the Dodgers.
